name: Skeletonlike
description:
Skeletonlike is a side-scrolling beat-em-up made for Miz Jam 1 (08/23/2020), programmed by JordanXion (Itch: Jordan4762) and art/design by Nuggetzrago (Itch: Trex373)

Skeletonlike supports 1-4 players (Local Co-op). 1 person can play on keyboard, with 3 people on controllers, or alternatively all 4 players can use controllers.  Tested with Xbox One and PS4 controllers on Windows.

Please leave a rating and any Comments/Suggestions/Bug Reports etc in the comment section below, it would be hugely appreciated! 

Controls:

        Join Game: Enter / Controller Start (Per keyboard / controller player)

  Restart Level: J / Controller Select

                   Move: WASD / Left Joystick / D-Pad

    Light Attack: Left Arrow / Xbox X / PS4 Square

 Heavy Attack: Right Arrow / Xbox B / PS4 Circle

                     Jump: Up Arrow / Xbox Y / PS4 Triangle

Known Issues/Bugs:
  • In multiplayer, players can walk off camera
  • Moving camera appears jittery
  • Leaf shadows in Forest section appear checkered on WebGL
  • If player joins game after initial players have already walked away from spawn, they will be far off screen
